body.name: OdoBan Aroma Eliminator and Disinfectant Set, 10 Ounce Toilet Spray 360-Degree Continuous Spray Natural Oil Real Citrus Lemon Air Freshener and 32 Ounce Multipurpose Cleaner Trigger Spray
body.stockDetail: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: Refresh Your Space: Freshen any room in an instant with our harsh aroma eliminator spray and multi-purpose cleaner. This citrus scent pack includes one can of natural oil air freshener and one original formula cleaner.

Natural Freshener: Our real citrus lemon air freshener is made with 99.99% natural ingredients. It contains natural citrus oils to freshen any living space for a fresh, clean, and lasting citrus scent. Also works as an in-bowl toilet freshener.

Multi-Purpose Cleaner: The ready-to-use multipurpose cleaner is an effective disinfectant, cleaner, sanitizer, and deodorizer for many household surfaces. It leaves no residue and also works as an air freshener or fabric and laundry refresher.

Where to Use: Our lemon scented home fresheners can be used in kitchens, bathrooms, offices, stores, schools, gyms, locker rooms, and more. They can be used in hotels, motels, public transportation, restrooms, near pet areas, and trash cans.

Super Convenient: Eliminate bad smells quickly and easily with our cleaner and air freshener. The natural citrus lemon room freshener has 360-degree continuous spray technology to spray at any angle, even upside down. Enjoy a fresh smell instantly.
body.description: The OdoBan ready-to-use 360-degree continuous air freshener plus multipurpose cleaner help eliminate harsh scents. This pack comes with one real citrus scented room spray (10 ounces) and one ready-to-use disinfectant deodorizer in a trigger spray bottle (32 ounces). The natural air freshening spray can be sprayed at any angle, even upside down. The pure air technology uses compressed air instead of flammable propellants, and our smell neutralizer is made with 99.99% natural ingredients. The natural citrus oils instantly freshen kitchens, bathrooms, and can be used as a toilet pre-spray to trap smells. Simply spray it into the toilet bowl before use to trap stinky smells under a barrier of natural oils. The real citrus lemon air freshener is great even on the go; please see package for specific room freshener instructions. Don’t just mask smells, eliminate them with our cleaning solution. It's a versatile all-in-one cleaner, disinfectant, sanitizer, and home freshener product that leaves no residue, and disinfects many non-porous household surfaces, countertops, and floors. Our citrus scented disinfectant removes bad smells and messes, and the original cleaning formula even helps freshen areas with moldy and mildewy smells affected by flood and water damage. It also helps freshen fabric, upholstery, bedding, laundry, and cleans pet urine aftermath in carpet. Our disinfectant deodorizer is great for floors, closets, and basements, and helps remove musty, mildew, or tobacco smoke smells. Control smells effortlessly with this multi-pack. OdoBan room freshener and cleaning products can be used in households and business facilities of all types including schools, athletic centers, hospitals, nursing homes, hotels, and restaurants. At OdoBan, we believe in creating quality products that are as effective as they are affordable with a motto of “if we don't love using it ourselves, we don't make it here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does it disinfect?
reviews.reviewText: I have to trust and Hope,this product disinfects...Its very expensive, and I really don't like the citrus ones I purchased! I have used essential oils for many years,this product does not smell like any real oils I've used!!
